const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "bug_reports",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      title: {
        type: "text",
      },
      labels: {
        type: "flattened",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "bug_reports",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    title: "Results are not sorted correctly.",
    labels: {
      priority: "urgent",
